comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: The picture shows the Friedrichshafen FF 33e Marinenummer '841' nicknamed Wölfchen. This plane was on board of the German ship 'Wolf' on its 64000 mile trip around the oceans (even till New Zealand) in the event destroying many ships. The 'Wölfchen' was the plane carried by the ship for reconnaissance. When the weather was good it was hoisted overboard with a crane and after the flight brought in again via the same method.
